评论详情: Ok so I’m 5’6” and 230lbs. I got the 2xl which is my usual size. When I first tried them on right out the package I thought they were a little big but I wanted a looser fit so I decided to keep them. I’m so happy I did they shrink slightly in the wash and fit really nice for the fit I was wanting. If you like super fitted I would order a size or 2 down. The material is so soft! A little thin but not shear and good quality with nice stitching. The length I can’t love enough! I do dislike all these women clothes with super short waist and sleeves. Not this shirt it is long in the sleeves and would fit even a long torso person nicely! The v neck is a deep v but it’s perfect for me. If your a busty women and want to be modest this probably isn’t the top for you. Overall I am very happy with this purchase I got a pack of 3 which came with all my favorite color no odd man out that I didn’t like! Love these shirts!

评论概述: Runs large and is too stretchy
评论详情: I usually wear an XL and don’t like things that are clingy or close fitting. An XL is too big in the neckline and if I put my shoulder seams where they belong the V neck dips waaay far below and shows most of my chest. Yet the arms are tight and it clings and bunches up. A Large still exposes an excessive amount of my “girls” and highlights muffin top and my slight but ever-present rolls from my inexpensive bra. I returned both L and XL and will  be looking for a long sleeved v-neck T with a more substantial cotton/polyester material and holds its shape and doesn’t cling.
